name: Asian Maverick
shortDescription: Lightweight sports shoe for daily wear
longDescription: The Asian Maverick features breathable mesh upper with reinforced toe cap, cushioned insole, and flexible rubber outsole. Perfect for morning walks and casual sports activities.

name: Trekker Pro
longDescription: Asian Trekker Pro with high ankle support and Vibram-style lug pattern sole. Features waterproof membrane and padded collar for rough terrain adventures.

name: Marathon Runner
longDescription: Asian Marathon Runner with air-cooled insole technology and lightweight EVA midsole. Perforated upper keeps feet dry during intense workouts.

name: City Stride
longDescription: Asian City Stride combines canvas upper with foam cushioning. Anti-slip rubber outsole perfect for urban commuting and college wear.

name: Power Flex
longDescription: Asian Power Flex with lateral support straps and multi-directional flex grooves. Ideal for gym workouts and aerobic exercises.

name: Monsoon Trek
longDescription: Asian Monsoon Trek features water-resistant upper, drainage channels, and extra-grip outsole. Special anti-fungal insole for wet conditions.

name: Street Champ
longDescription: Asian Street Champ with high-top design, padded ankle collar, and herringbone traction pattern. Durable synthetic leather upper.

name: Air Lite
longDescription: Asian Air Lite weighs just 210g with breathable knit upper and compression-molded EVA midsole. Perfect for seniors and long walks.

name: Grand Slam
longDescription: Asian Grand Slam with clay court outsole pattern and reinforced toe guard. Cushioned midsole for hard court impact protection.

name: Trail Blazer
longDescription: Asian Trail Blazer with rock protection plate, gusseted tongue, and aggressive lug pattern. Designed for mountain trails and rocky terrain.
